English: a falling leaf returns to the roots (idiom); everything has its ancestral home

English: a falling leaf returns to the roots (idiom); everything has its ancestral home
In old age, an expatriate longs to return home.
francais: La feuille tombée retourne à la racine.
Toute chose retourne à son point d'origine.
